body.name: Steamer for Clothes, Handheld Steamer for Garment, Portable Steamer, 700W Strong Penetrating Travel Iron Removes Wrinkles on Clothes and Fabric 120ml Big Capacity for Office and Travel(Black)

features: 👔【Pulse Booster Technology】This Steamer for Clothes uses pulse amplification and triple atomization technology to provide nano-scale dry steam at high temperature and pressure. Clothes can be used instantly without moisture or stains. This steamer creates strong penetrating steam and can be used for a wide range of fabrics (chiffon/silk/wool/cotton/linen/nylon, etc.).

👕【Fast Wrinkle Reduction】700 Watt Steam Generator produces nano-sized dry steam.5.8ft extra long cord for easy movement. Easy to fill removeable 120ml water tank, this garment steamer can steam continuously for 10 minutes - Safe to use on all types of fabric, It is your best anti-wrinkle helper.

👗【Safe and Durable】Unique 304 stainless steel heating plate ensures rust and oxidation resistance, Includes auto shut-off safety,with a service life far exceeding that of other materials such as aluminum. The casing is made of highly rigid engineering plastic ABS for extreme durability.
👖【Take It Anywhere】Easy to carry with a compact body. The garment steamer is only 1lb in weight. Perfect for home, business trips, vacations, or anywhere else.

🧥【Power Requirement】OLAYMEY Clothing Steamer only use in 110-120V countries and regions such as the US, Canada, Japan. However, Plugging into a not 110-120V outlet will damage the product. Please also note that the clothes steamer handheld should not be tilted more than 35° during use.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SPECIFICATION: Unit Weight (Bare): 0.45kg Water Tank Capacity: 120ml Wattage: 700W Voltage: 110-120V, 50/60Hz Warm Tips: Please use a transformer which can convert voltage to 110V when using this steamer abroad.
CAUTION Do not tilt > 35° angle. Do not exceed the "MAX" water level. Do not let the body soak in water.

Make Your Life Easier With OLAYMEY Handheld Steamer NOTE: * The steamer is designed for American voltage standard, only applicable to 110V voltage. * Water over Max line may cause water leakage. Please make sure the water is lower than Max line. * Any tilting of the steamer while working may cause water leakage or spurting out. Please make sure you hold the steamer upright while using it to steam fabrics. * Any other chemical substance added to the water may cause water spurting out from the nozzle. Distilled or purified water must be used to prevent water spurting out. * If tap water is used, please dump all the water out after each usage and do not reuse the water. * Steam coming out from the nozzle can be very hot. Please never use the steamer on clothes that you are wearing on yourself or pointing the nozzle against any human or pet. * If water is spurting out, there is probably some residue in the water tank. Please clean it with vinegar or lemon water (Suggested ratio : water to vinegar: 8 :2. Water to lemon: 7:3 ). Dump the water after boiling.

GY169-BLACK GY169-WHITE Product Name Garment steamer Garment steamer Type Boiler type Boiler type Color Black White Applicable voltage 110-120V 110-120V Water tank capacity 120ML 120ML Steam volume 18G/Min 18G/Min

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact, easy to use and works well!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is a terrific travel companion - especially if you are in a rush and need to quickly steam those wrinkles out of a shirt, pants or jeans. Heats up fast & does the job. I've even used this to help take off some old tint from my car!Small but has been very effective!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Compact but powerful
reviews.reviewText: Nice compact clothes steamer. But cannot be used laying flat, water all over your clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really like the size and how fast it heats up. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Spits Boiling Hot Water Everywhere
reviews.reviewText: The first time I used this it worked great. I thought it was going to me a great product. A few days later I turned it on to use it a second time and it started spitting out water everywhere. The water gets boiling hot in the inside, so when the water came flying out it splashed onto my leg and foot and burned me. I thought maybe I did something so I tried it for a third time and left it sitting upright on the counter and the same thing happened- water was spitting everywhere. Terrible product, do not recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought it for traveling and it won’t take up space

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great item for traveling! Especially when your clothes gets wrinkled packed up and you get to the hotel and there’s no iron!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good product. Got it for my mom for Christmas. A lot smaller than I anticipated but works perfectly.
